Reviews.Title: I got all I ever need for taking nice shots of the world
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to use, and the touch screen is quite convenient. The image quality is great. All gears included in the bag are of good quality. I'm very happy with the products.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 17 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-5T Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 55-210mm Lens + <3> Sony 64GB SDXC Class 10 Card + <4> Spare NP-FW50 Battery +
<5> Battery Charger + <6> Shutter Remote Control + <7> Bower Flash & Video Light + <8> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case +
<9> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> 40.5mm UV Filter + <12> 49mm UV Filter +
<13> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <14> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <16> LCD Screen Protectors + <17> 40.5-58mm Step Up Ring
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-5T Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) with 55-210mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash/LED Video Light + Filters + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
